author: sidler
msg: Removed jakarta-servlet-api-4.jar. It's not needed here and may lead
to problems with some servlet containers, as reported by Mark Whelan.

author: sidler
msg: Moved jakarta-servlet-api-4.jar from WEB-INF/lib to WEB-INF/build-lib so
that it is not in the classpath during run time. Adjusted build.xml. This fixes
the problem reported by Mark Whelan.

author: sidler
msg: Removed outdated Struts from 'simple' example. It's not used here.

author: sidler
msg: Updated struts application examples to latest Struts 1.0.1
